languages.text: "Наши шаттлы безостановочно прочесывают воздушное пространство, в пределах которого сгинули все наши люди. Таким образом нам удалось сократить зону поисков всего до нескольких тысяч километров... Однако это не отменяет тот факт, что люди бесследно исчезают в лесах и что-то глушит вокс-связь".

traits.locale_text: "Наши шаттлы безостановочно прочесывают воздушное пространство, в пределах которого сгинули все наши люди. Таким образом нам удалось сократить зону поисков всего до нескольких тысяч километров... Однако это не отменяет тот факт, что люди бесследно исчезают в лесах и что-то глушит вокс-связь".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."
languages.original_text: "Наши шаттлы безостановочно прочесывают воздушное пространство, в пределах которого сгинули все наши люди. Таким образом нам удалось сократить зону поисков всего до нескольких тысяч километров... Однако это не отменяет тот факт, что люди бесследно исчезают в лесах и что-то глушит вокс-связь".

traits.locale_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where all our people have perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where all our people have perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Nos navettes survolent inlassablement l'endroit où nos forces ont péri. Nous avons ainsi pu réduire la zone de recherche à un périmètre de quelques milliers de kilomètres carrés... Mais cela n'explique toujours pas pourquoi nos gens disparaissent dans la végétation sans laisser de traces et les communications-vox sont brouillées. »
languages.original_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."

traits.locale_text: « Nos navettes survolent inlassablement l'endroit où nos forces ont péri. Nous avons ainsi pu réduire la zone de recherche à un périmètre de quelques milliers de kilomètres carrés... Mais cela n'explique toujours pas pourquoi nos gens disparaissent dans la végétation sans laisser de traces et les communications-vox sont brouillées. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “我们的穿梭机正孜孜不倦地扫描着我们的人遇难的区域。通过这种方式，我们成功地把搜索范围缩小到了几千公里……但即便如此，依然无法改变这个事实——这座森林里的人消失得无影无踪，有什么东西正在干扰我们的音阵传输。”
languages.original_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."

traits.locale_text: “我们的穿梭机正孜孜不倦地扫描着我们的人遇难的区域。通过这种方式，我们成功地把搜索范围缩小到了几千公里……但即便如此，依然无法改变这个事实——这座森林里的人消失得无影无踪，有什么东西正在干扰我们的音阵传输。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Unsere Shuttles durchkämmen unaufhörlich den Luftraum, in dem unsere Leute gestorben sind. So konnten wir das Suchgebiet auf ein paar tausend Kilometer einschränken ... Das ändert aber nichts an der Tatsache, dass im Dickicht spurlos Leute verschwunden und irgendetwas die Voxübertragungen blockiert."
languages.original_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Shuttles durchkämmen unaufhörlich den Luftraum, in dem unsere Leute gestorben sind. So konnten wir das Suchgebiet auf ein paar tausend Kilometer einschränken ... Das ändert aber nichts an der Tatsache, dass im Dickicht spurlos Leute verschwunden und irgendetwas die Voxübertragungen blockiert."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Nuestras lanzaderas exploran sin descanso el espacio aéreo donde eliminaron a nuestra gente. Así es como pudimos reducir el área de búsqueda a solo unos miles de kilómetros... Igualmente, la gente que se ha perdido en el espeso bosque desaparece sin dejar rastro y algo está interfiriendo en las transmisiones de voco».
languages.original_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestras lanzaderas exploran sin descanso el espacio aéreo donde eliminaron a nuestra gente. Así es como pudimos reducir el área de búsqueda a solo unos miles de kilómetros... Igualmente, la gente que se ha perdido en el espeso bosque desaparece sin dejar rastro y algo está interfiriendo en las transmisiones de voco».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「私たちのシャトルは、仲間たちが亡くなった宇宙域を隅々まで薙ぎ払っている。これにより、捜索エリアを数千キロにまで縮小した…それでもなお、森の中にいる者が消息を絶っていること、そして何かがヴォクス通信を妨害しているという事実は変わらない」
languages.original_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちのシャトルは、仲間たちが亡くなった宇宙域を隅々まで薙ぎ払っている。これにより、捜索エリアを数千キロにまで縮小した…それでもなお、森の中にいる者が消息を絶っていること、そして何かがヴォクス通信を妨害しているという事実は変わらない」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Mekiklerimiz; kaybolanların son bilinen konumlarında arama yapıyor, canla başla çalışıyorlar. Böylece arama bölgesini birkaç bin kilometreye kadar düşürebildik... Bu, ormanda insanların kaybolduğu ve bir şeylerin voks iletişimlerini engellediği gerçeklerini değiştirmiyor tabii."
languages.original_text: "Our shuttles are relentlessly sweeping the airspace where our people perished. This way we were able to reduce the search area to just a few thousand kilometres... Which still does not change the fact that people in the thicket are disappearing without a trace and something is jamming the vox-transmissions."
